author: sidler
msg: Created new 'all' target to build entire project, including all subprojects. See
README in root dir for the new very simple build process. It is still possible
to build subprojects individually. Super 'all' target calls 'all' targets of

author: sidler
msg: Replaced the term "context tool" by "view tool" in the documentation and

author: sidler
msg: Updated documentation of LinkTool to reflect the added URI encoding

author: sidler
msg: Modified VelStruts LinkTool such that it encodes the session ID into
the returned URL if cookies are not supported by the web client.
This enhancement required that  ViewContext and ChainedContext are
augmented to return the HttpServletResponse as well.
